title: Remove The Grave Clothes | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Remove The Grave Clothes | Joel Osteen
description:
It’s easy to judge others, but beneath the mess and bad decisions, there’s a son or a daughter of the Most High God. God is counting on us to represent His love and make a difference in the lives of others. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
